name: FLUTIFORM 125/5
treatmentDescriptions: The regular treatment of asthma where use of a combination product (an inhaled corticosteroid and a long -acting β2 agonist) is appropriate:• For patients not adequately controlled with inhaled corticosteroids and ‘as required’ inhaled short -acting β2 agonist.• For patients already adequately controlled on both an inhaled corticosteroid and a long-acting β2 agonist.Flutiform 125mcg/5mcg inhaler is indicated in adults and adolescents aged 12 years and above.
ingredients: FLUTICASONE PROPIONATE 0.125 MG/DOSE, FORMOTEROL FUMARATE DIHYDRATE 0.005 MG/DOSE
warnings: תרופה מוגבלת לרישום ע'י רופא מומחה או הגבלה אחרת
